brand_identity.name: ChiPi Link
key_principles: Density over Whitespace: Use compact rows and grids.
Separators over Borders: Use 8-12px gray gaps to separate sections instead of 1px borders.
Native Feel: Sticky headers, edge-to-edge content on mobile.
Visual Hierarchy: Color > Size. Use color to denote status and category.

container.desktop: max-w-md mx-auto shadow-2xl min-h-screen border-x border-border/50

grid.quick_access: grid grid-cols-4 gap-y-4 gap-x-2 p-4 bg-background

QuickAccess.style: Icon + Label. Icon in a colored 'squircle' (rounded-2xl) background.

NewsCard.style: Horizontal list item (Left: Text, Right: Image).

EventCard.style: Calendar leaf style (Left: Date Box, Right: Details).
EventCard.date_box: bg-red-50 text-red-700 rounded-lg flex-col center p-2 w-16

SectionHeader.style: Sticky top, bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-sm, border-b border-border/50.
SectionHeader.typography: text-lg font-bold flex justify-between items-center px-4 py-3

instructions_to_main_agent: TRANSFORM the 'SuperAppLanding.jsx' to look like a mobile app feed.
REMOVE generic shadcn Cards. Use 'List Item' styling with separators.
USE the color palette: Imperial Red (#C8102E) for primary actions.
ENSURE the Quick Access grid uses colorful icon backgrounds (Squircle shape).
ADD 'Section Separators': 8px-12px height blocks of color #F2F4F6 between sections.
KEEP all existing functionality (Edit Mode, API calls). ONLY change the UI/JSX structure.
USE 'lucide-react' icons as they are already installed.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not get biased or lean towards generic AI designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable (except for SuperApp dense lists).
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
